detaileddescription.para: Set number of backbuffer viewports to render. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set a backbuffer viewport. BIND_AS_ALIAS_set_viewports
Set default renderpath. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set default renderpath from an XML file.

detaileddescription.para: Set default non-textured material technique. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set HDR rendering on/off. BIND_AS_ALIAS_set_hdrRendering
Set specular lighting on/off. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set default texture max anisotropy level. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set default texture filtering. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set texture quality level. See the QUALITY constants in GraphicsDefs.h. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set material quality level. See the QUALITY constants in GraphicsDefs.h. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadows on/off. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow map resolution. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow quality mode. See the SHADOWQUALITY enum in GraphicsDefs.h. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow softness, only works when SHADOWQUALITY_BLUR_VSM is used. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set shadow parameters when VSM is used, they help to reduce light bleeding. LightBleeding must be in [0, 1].

detaileddescription.para: Set VSM shadow map multisampling level. Default 1 (no multisampling). BIND_AS_ALIAS_set_vsmMultiSample
Set post processing filter to the shadow map. NO_BIND
Set reuse of shadow maps. Default is true. If disabled, also transparent geometry can be shadowed. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum number of shadow maps created for one resolution. Only has effect if reuse of shadow maps is disabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set dynamic instancing on/off. When on (default), drawables using the same static-type geometry and material will be automatically combined to an instanced draw call. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set number of extra instancing buffer elements. Default is 0. Extra 4-vectors are available through TEXCOORD7 and further. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set minimum number of instances required in a batch group to render as instanced. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum number of sorted instances per batch group. If exceeded, instances are rendered unsorted. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum number of occluder triangles. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set occluder buffer width. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set required screen size (1.0 = full screen) for occluders. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether to thread occluder rendering. Default false. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow depth bias multiplier for mobile platforms to counteract possible worse shadow map precision. Default 1.0 (no effect). BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow depth bias addition for mobile platforms to counteract possible worse shadow map precision. Default 0.0 (no effect). BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow normal offset multiplier for mobile platforms to counteract possible worse shadow map precision. Default 1.0 (no effect). BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Force reload of shaders.
Apply post processing filter to the shadow map. Called by View.

detaileddescription.para: Return number of backbuffer viewports. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return backbuffer viewport by index. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_viewports

briefdescription.para: Return nth backbuffer viewport associated to a scene. Index 0 returns the first.
